## Project Requirements Summary:
- Restaurant POS system using MERN stack
- MongoDB with local MongoDB Compass
- Modules: Sales, User Management, Purchase, Dashboard, KOT System, Menu Management, Table Management, Split Billing, Inventory, Order Queue
- Interfaces: Web Admin Panel, KOT Panel, Mobile App, Customer Ordering App
- Real-time features with Socket.io
- Complete restaurant workflow support
